chatbot.welcomeMessage: Barka da zuwa Powerton Engineering! Yaya zan iya taimaka muku a yau?

options.supplyChainService: 📦 Gudanar da Sarkar Samar da Kaya
options.regularBusinessHours: ⏰ Lokacin Aiki na yau da kullun

responses.products: Muna ba da cikakken kewayon kayayyakin sarrafa masana'antu, kayan lantarki, kayan aiki, tsarin hasken rana, da ƙari. Waɗanne takamaiman samfuran kuke nema?
responses.services: Ayyukanmu sun haɗa da shigarwa, kulawa, daidaitawa, tallafin fasaha, da mafita na al'ada. Wanne sabis ne ya fi sha'awar ku?
responses.contact: Kuna iya isa gare mu a +91-94627-71662 ko imel ɗin mu a info@powertonengineering.com. Hedkwatar mu tana cikin Noida, Indiya, kuma muna hidimar abokan ciniki a duk duniya.
responses.quote: Zan yi farin cikin taimaka muku samun faɗin farashi! Da fatan za a ziyarci shafinmu na faɗin farashi ko ku ba ni buƙatunku.
responses.support: Ƙungiyarmu ta tallafin fasaha tana nan don taimakawa! Da fatan za a bayyana tambayar ku ta fasaha ko matsalar ku.
responses.productSelection: Yayi kyau! Muna da ɗimbin samfuran masana'antu a cikin nau'ikan da yawa. Wanne nau'i ya fi sha'awar ku?
responses.serviceSelection: Muna ba da cikakkun ayyukan injiniya don tallafawa ayyukanku daga farawa zuwa ƙare. Wanne sabis za mu iya taimaka muku da shi?
responses.troubleshootingMain: Ina nan don taimaka muku wajen magance matsalolin fasaha. Wane irin matsala kuke fuskanta?
responses.companyInfo: Powerton Engineering kamfani ne na sarrafa masana'antu da injiniyan lantarki tare da gogewar shekaru 15+. Muna hidimar abokan ciniki a duk duniya tare da cikakkun mafita.
responses.electricalCategory: Muna samar da cikakkun kayan lantarki don aikace-aikacen masana'antu gami da rarraba wutar lantarki, sarrafawa, da kayan kariya. Waɗanne kayan lantarki kuke buƙata?
responses.automationCategory: Magancewar sarrafa kansa ɗin mu sun haɗa da PLCs, SCADA, DCS, da tsarin HMI don cikakken sarrafa masana'antu. Wace ƙalubalen sarrafa kansa za mu iya warware muku?
responses.solarCategory: Muna ba da cikakkun mafita na hasken rana daga bangarori zuwa shigarwa da kulawa. Wane aikin hasken rana kuke shirin yi?
responses.safetyCategory: Tsaro yana da mahimmanci a cikin aikace-aikacen masana'antu. Muna ba da cikakken kewayon kayan kariya da tsaro. Waɗanne kayan aikin tsaro kuke buƙata?
responses.installationService: Ƙungiyoyinmu na shigarwa na ƙwararru suna tabbatar da saitin da aiki mai kyau na tsarin masana'antu. Wane kayan aiki ne ke buƙatar shigarwa?
responses.electricalTroubleshooting: Zan iya taimakawa wajen gano matsalolin lantarki. Matsalolin gama gari sun haɗa da gazawar samar da wutar lantarki, tafiyar kariya ta kewayawa, da batutuwan ƙasa. Waɗanne alamomi kuke fuskanta?
responses.sensorTroubleshooting: Matsalolin na'ura na iya shafar daidaiton aunawa. Matsalolin gama gari sun haɗa da ɓarkewar daidaitawa, tsangwama na sigina, da abubuwan muhalli. Wace matsalar na'ura kuke fuskanta?
responses.automationSearch: Zan iya taimaka muku samun cikakkiyar mafita ta atomatik! Kewayonmu ya haɗa da PLCs, tsarin SCADA, hanyoyin sadarwa na HMI, da cikakkun fakitin sarrafawa.
responses.solarSearch: Yayi kyau! Magancewar hasken rana ɗin mu sun haɗa da cikakken ƙirar tsarin, shigarwa, da sabis na kulawa don aikace-aikacen zama, kasuwanci, da masana'antu.
responses.mechanicalSearch: Babban zaɓi! Muna ba da cikakken kewayon motoci, famfo, bawul, da kayan aikin injiniya don aikace-aikace daban-daban na masana'antu.
responses.serviceSearch: Cikakke! Ba da sabis ɗinmu sun haɗa da daidaitawa, shirye-shiryen kulawa, tallafin gaggawa, da cikakkun hanyoyin horarwa.
responses.contactSearch: Ga duk hanyoyin da za ku iya isa gare mu! Muna samuwa ta hanyoyi da yawa don sauƙin ku.
responses.powerSupplyHelp: Matsalolin samar da wutar lantarki na iya zama masu mahimmanci. Matsalolin gama gari sun haɗa da sauyin wutar lantarki, yin lodin fiye da kima, gurbatar jituwa, da gazawar kayan aiki. Bari in taimaka muku samun mafita mai kyau.
responses.temperatureSensorHelp: Daidaitaccen ma'aunin zafin jiki yana da mahimmanci don sarrafa tsarin. Batutuwa galibi sun haɗa da ɓarkewar daidaitawa, tsangwama na muhalli, ko tsufa na na'ura. Ga yadda za mu iya taimakawa.
responses.plcTroubleshooting: Batutuwan PLC na iya dakatar da samarwa. Matsalolin gama gari sun haɗa da kurakuran shirye-shirye, gazawar I/O, kurakuran sadarwa, da batutuwan samar da wutar lantarki. Bari mu dawo da tsarin ku kan layi.
responses.solarPerformanceHelp: Matsalolin aikin tsarin hasken rana na iya yin tasiri sosai ga samar da makamashi. Abubuwan da ke haifar da su sun haɗa da kurakuran inverter, lalata panel, shading, da gazawar tsarin sa ido.

chatbotMessages.quoteHelp: Zan yi farin cikin taimaka muku samun faɗin farashi na musamman! Farashinmu yana da gasa kuma a bayyane yake. Don daidaitaccen farashi, muna buƙatar fahimtar takamaiman buƙatunku. Bari mu haɗa ku da ƙungiyar tallace-tallace don cikakken tattaunawa.
chatbotMessages.helpAssist: Ina nan don taimaka muku a kowane mataki na hanya! Ko kuna buƙatar jagorar zaɓin samfur, ƙayyadaddun fasaha, tallafin sabis, ko kuma kawai kuna son ƙarin koyo game da kamfaninmu, ina kan sabis ɗinku. Wace taimako kuke so?
chatbotMessages.businessHoursInfo: Muna nan lokacin da kuke buƙatar mu! Lokacin aiki na mu shine Litinin zuwa Asabar: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM. Muna kuma ba da tallafin gaggawa a ranakun Lahadi don mahimman yanayi. An samo asali a Noida, Sector 6, F-25, F Block (metro mafi kusa: Sector 15).
chatbotMessages.pricingInfo: Farashinmu koyaushe yana da gasa kuma a bayyane yake! Mun yi imanin samar da ƙima don kuɗi ba tare da ɓoyayyun farashi ba. Farashin ya dogara da ƙayyadaddun bayanai, yawa, da girman aikin. Don mafi daidaitaccen faɗin farashi, ƙungiyarmu za ta kimanta takamaiman buƙatunku.
chatbotMessages.achievements: Muna alfahari da nasarorinmu! An kammala ayyuka masu nasara sama da 500+, abokan ciniki sama da 50+, gogewar shekaru 15+, da haɗin gwiwa tare da shugabannin masana'antu kamar Thermax, Motherson, da Praj Industries. Aikinmu na shuka hasken rana na 10MW da tsarin sarrafa magunguna na cikin manyan nasarorinmu ne.
chatbotMessages.mainMenu: Barka da dawowa babban menu! Ina nan don taimaka muku da duk wata buƙata ta sarrafa masana'antu. Ko kuna neman kayayyaki, ayyuka, tallafin fasaha, ko bayanin kamfani, zan jagorance ku zuwa madaidaicin bayani. Da me zan iya taimaka muku?
chatbotMessages.urgentSupport: Batutuwa masu gaggawa sun haɗa da: gazawar kayan aiki da ke shafar samarwa, batutuwa masu mahimmanci na tsaro, lalacewa ta gaggawa, lokutan ƙarewa na shigarwa, da rashin aiki na tsarin. Don waɗannan yanayi, kira mu nan da nan a +91-94627-71662. Muna ba da tallafin gaggawa na 24/7 don mahimman yanayi.
chatbotMessages.productComparison: Zan iya taimaka muku kwatanta kayayyaki! Faɗin zaɓinmu ya haɗa da na'urori masu auna sigina, tsarin sarrafa kansa, kayan lantarki, da kayayyakin hasken rana. Gaya mani waɗanne takamaiman kayayyaki kuke kwatanta ko wace aikace-aikacen kuke buƙatar su, kuma zan jagorance ku zuwa mafi kyawun zaɓuɓɓuka.
chatbotMessages.quoteTips: Ga wasu nasihu don samun mafi kyawun faɗin farashi: 1) Samar da cikakkun ƙayyadaddun bayanai da buƙatu, 2) Ka ambaci yawan da ake buƙata, 3) Haɗa da jadawalin lokacin aikin, 4) Ƙayyade wurin shigarwa, 5) Lissafa duk wani buƙatu na musamman ko takaddun shaida da ake buƙata. Ƙarin cikakkun bayanai da kuka bayar, mafi daidaitaccen faɗin farashinmu zai kasance!
chatbotMessages.defaultResponse: Na gode da tuntubar mu! Ina nan don taimaka muku samun cikakkiyar mafita ta sarrafa masana'antu. A Powerton Engineering, mun yi imanin cewa kowane abokin ciniki ya cancanci kulawa ta musamman da jagorar ƙwararru. Wace takamaiman ƙalubale ko buƙata zan iya taimaka muku da ita a yau?
chatbotMessages.productsPageResponse: Cikakke! Na kai ku shafinmu na kayayyaki inda zaku iya bincika faɗin zaɓinmu na hanyoyin sarrafa masana'antu. Za ku sami cikakkun bayanai, hotuna, da bayanan fasaha don kowane nau'in samfur. Kuna buƙatar taimako wajen nemo wani abu na musamman ko kuna da tambayoyi game da kowane samfur?
chatbotMessages.servicesPageResponse: Kyakkyawan zaɓi! Shafinmu na ayyuka yana nuna cikakkun tayin tallafinmu daga shigarwa zuwa kulawa. Mu ne cikakken abokin injiniyan ku don duk tsawon rayuwar aikin. Wane irin tallafin sabis kuke nema?
chatbotMessages.contactPageResponse: Yayi kyau! Shafin tuntuba yana da duk bayananmu gami da wurin ofis, lambobin waya, da fom ɗin tuntuba. Muna cikin Noida kuma muna samuwa Litinin-Asabar. Jin kyauta don tuntuɓar kowane lokaci! Akwai wani abu na musamman da kuke son tattaunawa da ƙungiyarmu?
chatbotMessages.aboutPageResponse: Abin ban mamaki! Shafinmu game da mu yana ba da cikakken labarin Powerton Engineering - tafiyarmu, nasarorinmu, ƙungiyarmu, da ƙimarmu. Tare da gogewar shekaru 15+ da ayyuka masu nasara sama da 500, muna alfahari da ƙwarewar injiniyanmu. Kuna son ƙarin sani game da wani takamaiman al'amari?
chatbotMessages.projectsPageResponse: Mai girma! Shafinmu na ayyuka yana nuna fayil ɗinmu na nasarar aiwatarwa a cikin masana'antu daban-daban. Daga tsire-tsire masu amfani da hasken rana na 10MW zuwa tsarin sarrafa magunguna, kowane aiki yana nuna ƙwarewarmu ta fasaha. Kuna sha'awar aikin makamancin haka?
chatbotMessages.quotePageResponse: Cikakke! Shafinmu na faɗin farashi zai taimaka muku samun cikakken shawarwari daidai da takamaiman buƙatunku. Ƙungiyarmu za ta tantance buƙatunku kuma ta ba da farashi mai gasa tare da bayyanannun sharuɗɗa. Wane irin bayani kuke nema don faɗin farashi?
chatbotMessages.genericPageResponse: Na umurce ku zuwa shafin da aka nema. Kuna iya samun duk bayanan da suka dace a can. Jin kyauta don bincika kuma ku sanar da ni idan kuna buƙatar kowane taimako ko kuna da tambayoyi game da abin da kuka samu!
chatbotMessages.callInitiated: Na fara kiran a gare ku! Ƙungiyarmu ta ƙwararru tana tsaye a shirye don ba da taimako nan da nan. Idan kiran bai haɗu ba, zaku iya isa gare mu ta imel ko ziyarci ofishinmu. Ta yaya zan iya taimaka muku a yau?
chatbotMessages.emailOpened: Na buɗe abokin ciniki na imel ɗinku tare da adireshinmu da aka riga aka cika! Da fatan za a bayyana buƙatunku dalla-dalla, kuma ƙungiyarmu za ta amsa cikin awanni 24. Don batutuwa masu gaggawa, kiran mu kai tsaye ya fi sauri. Da menene zan iya taimaka muku?
chatbotMessages.externalResourceOpened: Na buɗe muku hanyar waje! Kuna iya bincika ƙarin bayani a can. Lokacin da kuka shirya ci gaba da tattaunawarmu ko kuna buƙatar ƙarin taimako, ina nan don taimakawa. Me kuke so ku yi na gaba?
chatbotMessages.actionCompleted: An kammala aiki! Ina nan don ci gaba da taimaka muku da duk wata tambaya ko buƙatu da kuke da ita. Me kuke so ku bincika na gaba?

welcomeMessage: Sannu! Ni ne Mashawarcin Injiniyan ku. Ina nan don taimaka muku samun madaidaicin hanyoyin sarrafa masana'antu, amsa tambayoyin fasaha, da kuma jagorantar ku ta cikin kayayyakinmu da ayyukanmu. Ta yaya zan iya taimaka muku a yau?

options.plcControllers: 🖥️ PLCs (Masu Kula da Ma'ana Mai Shirye-shirye)

responses.productSelection: Babban zaɓi! Zan iya taimaka muku nemo cikakkun samfuran don bukatun sarrafa masana'antu. Wanne nau'i ya fi sha'awar ku?
responses.electricalCategory: Madalla! An ƙera kayan aikin lantarki don aminci da tsaro a cikin mahalli na masana'antu. Wane nau'in kayan lantarki kuke nema?
responses.automationCategory: Cikakke! Tsarin sarrafa kansa da sarrafawa na taimakawa wajen daidaita ayyuka da haɓaka inganci. Wane nau'in maganin sarrafa kansa kuke buƙata?
responses.solarCategory: Abin mamaki! Magancewar makamashin hasken rana na ƙara zama mahimmanci ga ayyukan dorewa. Waɗanne kayayyakin hasken rana kuke sha'awar?
responses.electricalTroubleshooting: Zan taimaka muku gano matsalolin lantarki mataki-mataki. Wace takamaiman matsalar lantarki kuke fuskanta?
responses.sensorTroubleshooting: Matsalolin na'ura na iya shafar daidaiton aunawa. Bari in taimaka muku gano da warware matsalar. Wane nau'in matsalar na'ura kuke fuskanta?
responses.controlTroubleshooting: Matsalolin tsarin sarrafawa na iya shafar dukkan aikin ku. Zan taimaka muku wajen magance matsala ta tsari. Wace matsalar tsarin sarrafawa kuke fuskanta?
responses.contactSearch: Ina farin cikin taimaka muku tuntuɓar ƙungiyarmu! Ga mafi kyawun hanyoyin da za ku iya isa gare mu:
responses.careerOptions: Shiga ƙungiyarmu ta ƙwararrun injiniyoyi da ƙwararrun fasaha! Muna ba da damammaki masu ban sha'awa na aiki, ci gaban ƙwararru, da yanayin aiki na haɗin gwiwa. Bincika buɗewar mu na yanzu ko ƙarin koyo game da yadda yake aiki a Powerton Engineering.

messages.mainMenu: Barka da dawowa babban menu! Ina nan don taimaka muku da duk wata buƙata ta sarrafa masana'antu. Ko kuna neman kayayyaki, ayyuka, tallafin fasaha, ko bayanin kamfani, zan jagorance ku zuwa madaidaicin bayani. Da me zan iya taimaka muku?
messages.helpAssist: Ina nan don taimaka muku a kowane mataki na hanya! Ko kuna buƙatar jagorar zaɓin samfur, ƙayyadaddun fasaha, tallafin sabis, ko kuma kawai kuna son ƙarin koyo game da kamfaninmu, ina kan sabis ɗinku. Wace taimako kuke so?

placeholders.askChatbot: Tambaye ni game da kayayyaki, ayyuka, ko tallafin fasaha...
